short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Light weight extension that aids in Google Account switching without having to click on the account selector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with this sleek, time-saving extension that makes switching Google accounts a breeze.

With two effortless methods to toggle between your Google Accounts, youâ€™ll stay in control:
1. Simply click the extension to cycle through the Google Account IDs you set in the options.
2. Use custom shortcuts (default: Alt + ID [e.g., 0, 1]) to instantly switch accounts.

Install now and experience the convenience of managing your accounts with just a click or a keystroke!
